Title: Sadie's Song
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Raven Molisee, Paul Villeco, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story)
Actors: Zach Callison, Colton Dunn, Kate Flannery, Reagan Gomez-Preston
Plot: After Steven finds Sadie singing in the Big Donut, he and her mom work to get Sadie to sing at this year's Beach-a-Palooza as the secret guest.
